name: Aterra (Canceled)
blurb: A 3D platform game set in a fantasy environment with a twist of bending gravity. A pleasant cocktail of Planescape, Portal and Thief.

rewards.reward: No Reward

KICKSTARTER ============================== Every \u00a31 raises the number of backers, so the campaign will be more visible, and with every 1000 backer we will extend the number of locations in the game. A "Kickstarter Backer" forum title and access to the "Backers Only" forum area. Your name will appear in the game credits with our special thanks. Every pledger reinforces that hardcore fantasy games are not dead and nor are PC Gamers!
EARLY BIRD SUPPORTER ============================== Early bird special price of the SUPPORTER tier!

SUPPORTER ============================== A free full version digital copy of Aterra upon its release, a "Kickstarter Backer" forum title and access to the "Backers Only" forum area. Your name will appear in the game credits with our special thanks. This low price only available for those who help fund.
EARLY BIRD BETA ACCESS ============================== Early bird special price of the BETA ACCESS tier!

BETA ACCESS ============================== A free full version digital copy of Aterra upon its release, a "Kickstarter Backer" forum title and access to the "Backers Only" forum area, plus early access to the Beta version of Aterra and Beta forum access. Your name will appear in the game credits with our special thanks.
EARLY BIRD ALPHA ACCESS ============================== Early Bird special price of the ALPHA ACCESS tier!

HEART OF GOLD ============================== A free full version digital copy of Aterra upon its release, a "Kickstarter Backer" forum title and access to the "Backers Only" forum area. Your name will appear in the game credits with our special thanks, plus we will send a free full version digital copy of Aterra in your name to the Child's Play Charity or a charity of your choice.

ALPHA ACCESS ============================== A free full version digital copy of Aterra upon its release, a "Kickstarter Backer" forum title and access to the "Backers Only" forum area, plus early access to the Alpha and Beta version of Aterra, plus Alpha and Beta forum access. Your name will appear in the game credits with our special thanks.

ALL DIGITAL ============================== A free full version digital copy of Aterra upon its release, a "Kickstarter Backer" forum title and access to the "Backers Only" forum area, plus early access to the Alpha and Beta version of Aterra, plus Alpha and Beta forum access. Your name will appear in the game credits with our special thanks. Participation in the making of the "Aterra: Ask Me Anything" video, a digital wallpaper, a PDF art book, digital soundtrack and PDF strategy guide.
MORE THAN WORDS ============================== As SUPPORTER above, plus a handwritten, archaic style letter of thanks from the team, signed by the team members.
TOUCH PIECE ============================== As SUPPORTER above, plus a gold coated, pure silver replica of the giant coin in the Coin room. The replica has roughly the same size as a \u00a32 coin.

MEMORIES ==============================  As SUPPORTER above, plus a unique, hand drawn WIP concept art, signed by the artist. Every piece is one-of-a-kind, never to be reprinted, so it is literally a unique memorabilia. You can pick yours from a tableau, first come, first served.

ITEM DESIGNER ============================== As SUPPORTER above, plus following guidelines from the Aterra team, design a rare loot or magic item to the game. You will have our full support during the process, and you will get the unique, hand drawn concept art - based on your design ideas - signed by the artist as well. Your name will be included in a special section of the game credits along with the development team, under "Additional Design", that notes the item you designed.

LEVEL DESIGNER ============================== As SUPPORTER above, plus following guidelines from the Aterra team, design a unique level to the game. You will have our full support during the process, and you will get the unique, hand drawn concept art - based on your design ideas - signed by the artist as well. Your name will be included in a special section of the game credits along with the development team, under "Additional Design", that notes the location you designed.

THE NAME OF THE GAME ============================== As SUPPORTER above, plus choose a tasteful name that is consistent with our game\u2019s lore for a magic item or unique loot of your choice. You can include a variation on your real name or your nickname if you wish; we\u2019ll work with you to come up with an appropriate and fitting idea.

ONE OF US ============================== As SUPPORTER above, plus design a unique level and two rare loots or magic items to the game. You will have our full support during the process, and you will get the three unique, hand drawn concept arts - based on your design ideas - signed by the artist as well. Your name will be included in a special section of the game credits along with the development team, under "Additional Design", that notes the items and level you designed. Including an hour long Skype conversation with the lead designer, or any other team member of your choice, when you can ask us anything.

TRADEMARK ============================== As SUPPORTER above, plus design the protagonist's trademark symbol. It can be drawn by you, or our graphic designer will draw it based on your suggestions and concepts. You will have our full support during the process, and you will get the unique concept art - based on your design ideas - signed by the artist as well. Your name will be included in a special section of the game credits along with the development team, under "Additional Design", that notes that the trademark was designed by you.

BECAUSE IT IS EVIL ============================== As SUPPORTER above, plus choose a name that is consistent with our game\u2019s lore for the antagonist of the game. Everything about the antagonist background, looks and motivations and his role in the recent, current and future events will be revealed for you to make the best choice. If you wish, you can name the boss in the game after yourself; we can use a variation on your real name or your nickname. We\u2019ll work with you to come up with an appropriate and fitting idea. You cannot reveal the name until we say so.

PRODUCER ============================== Become the producer of the game. As SUPPORTER above, plus you can take a look at the work progress, chat with us, call us on Skype and eat our desserts any time. You can meet with us if you can manage to travel to Budapest, Hungary. Including a fun weekend with free meals and a video game session with the games of your choice in which you can try to kick our ass. You will have a special place in our heart and in the credits as well. In addition, you are an Honorary member of the team and will be credited as such.
